paragraphs.body: A-class articles are articles of very high standard written to a professional exemplar. They are denoted by the ${link_0} icon.
paragraphs.text: A-class articles are articles of very high standard written to a professional exemplar. They are denoted by the Crown Prince headpiece icon.

paragraphs.body: This recognition is separate from ${link_0}, which are articles that have been, or are featured on the main page. These are articles of excellent quality that have been chosen to enhance their visibility.
paragraphs.text: This recognition is separate from featured articles, which are articles that have been, or are featured on the main page. These are articles of excellent quality that have been chosen to enhance their visibility.

paragraphs.body: A-class articles are promoted and demoted by the users who make up the ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: A-class articles are promoted and demoted by the users who make up the Standards Council.
